properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8 v9 v10

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Rejoice in the Lord always, and again I say rejoice. Rejoice in the Lord always, and again I say rejoice.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Rejoice, rejoice and again I say rejoice. Rejoice, rejoice and again I say rejoice.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I can do all things through Him, the One who strengthens me. I can do all things through Him, the One who strengthens me.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I can, I can through Him who strengthens me. I can, I can through Him who strengthens me.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The peace of God will guard your heart. His peace will guard your heart. The peace of God will guard your heart. His peace will guard your heart.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}His peace, His peace, His peace will guard your heart. His peace, His peace, His peace will guard your heart.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The love of God is found in Him, His name is Jesus Christ. The love of God is found in Him, His name is Jesus Christ.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: {lang-eng}(sisters) His name, His name, His name is Jesus Christ His name, His name, His name is Jesus Christ. (brothers) The love of God is found in Him, His name is Jesus Christ{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: {lang-eng}For me to live is Jesus Christ, for me to live is Christ. For me to live is Jesus Christ, for me to live is Christ. 10. For me, to live, for me to live is Christ. For me, to live, for me to live is Christ.{/lang-eng}
